content.prompt: What overall function do “the others” (line 30) serve within the context of the poem?

choices.label: They serve as flawed figures, while Aunt Virginia embodies virtue.
They represent being immersed in life, while Aunt Virginia represents embracing death.
They exemplify treasured friendships from Aunt Virginia’s past.
They signify the world that Aunt Virginia does not want to leave.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
